$comment: Template for creating a new Empleaido

instructions.id: Format: empleaido-XXXXX where XXXXX is 5-digit serial
instructions.name: 2-20 characters, uppercase recommended
instructions.sephirot.primary: One of: Keter, Chokmah, Binah, Chesed, Gevurah, Tiferet, Netzach, Hod, Yesod, Malkuth
instructions.visual.accessory: Single differentiating element: none, headband, moustache, badge, glasses, earring
